code:
%%{Logistics_Warehouse}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
  [Logistics_StockLevel] --> OFF
  %% 시작 경로
  OFF --> WARMUP: START(Logistics_FleetManagement) + MODE=WARM_UP
  OFF --> INIT: START(Logistics_Warehouse)
  INIT --> PRECOOL: init_seconds elapsed
  PRECOOL --> RUN: T5 <= TSP - precool_band
  %% READY 표출 (Logistics_FleetManagement)
  INIT --> READY: ready flag true
  PRECOOL --> READY: ready flag true
  RUN --> READY: ready flag true
  READY --> RUN: ready flag cleared
  %% 보류/재개
  RUN --> HOLD: HOLD(Logistics_FleetManagement)
  READY --> HOLD: HOLD(Logistics_Warehouse)
  HOLD --> RUN: RESUME(Logistics_TrackingNumber)
  %% 정지/전원 OFF
  any --> OFF: STOP(Logistics_DeliveryRoute) or OFF(Logistics_Warehouse)
  WARMUP --> OFF: warm reached
  %% 안전 전이
  state SAFE_SHUTDOWN
  INIT --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  PRECOOL --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  RUN --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  READY --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  HOLD --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  WARMUP --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  SAFE_SHUTDOWN --> OFF: RESET(Logistics_StockLevel)=ACK_ALARM
